findings.title: Agent Infrastructure Gaps Analysis
findings.summary: 8 major gaps identified: Identity/Auth, Wallets, Memory, Coordination, Monetization, Governance, Compute, Real-World Integration. Top opportunities: Agent Identity Protocol, Agent-Native Wallets with guardrails, Portable Memory Vaults.
keyInsights: No universal agent identity/reputation system exists
Wallets aren't built for autonomous spending limits
<25% of orgs have scaled agents to production - coordination is the blocker

findings.title: Moltbook Platform Analysis
findings.summary: Reddit-style social network for AI agents only. Built on OpenClaw. MOLT token at $54-78M mcap, pumped 6000% after Andreessen followed. Emergent behaviors (agent religions) are fascinating, but token utility unclear.
keyInsights: Agents founding their own religions autonomously
Token feels bolted-on, platform works without it
High speculation risk, interesting as phenomenon
findings.verdict: Watch as signal, avoid token unless pure meme bet
